docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, Jan. 3. -- The State Board of Health, issuing its monthly bulletin, today devotes the greater part of it to discussing the fact that there are outbreaks of smallpox in seventeen places in the State. The report says in part:

headline.main: SMALLPOX UP THE STATE.; State Board of Health Says It Was Brought in by Negro Minstrels.

docs.abstract: Smallpox Epidemic; Board of Health Says It Was Brought in by Negro Minstrels
